projects.name: NON GOVERNMENT ORGANIZATION WEBSITE USING REACT JS,JAVASCRIPT,NODE JS,EXPRESS JS
projects.description: Developed a responsive and intuitive web chat application using modern web technologies such as React.js and Node.js with robust features and highly efficient attributes. Implemented real-time user registering to ensure they can take part in various events like blood donation camp, clean the city and other drives. Designed and integrated user authentication and authorization systems to ensure secure access as well as seamless navigation across different web pages.

projects.name: EMPLOYEE DIRECTORY APPLICATION USING AMAZON WEB SERVICES
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive employee directory management application using EC2 instances and S3 Storage principles. Implemented intuitive user interfaces for Employee name, uploading employee photo, department selection, enhancing the user experience.

projects.name: NETFLIX CLONE USING REACT JS HTML,CSS,JAVASCRIPT,NODE JS
projects.description: Developed a comprehensive streaming web application where the main motive was to ensure that a download column could be consolidated similar to the mobile application. Implemented secure user authentication and role-based access control to protect sensitive user data and ensure encrypted download options.
